name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Highly skilled Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in deploying and managing high-performance applications and infrastructure, specializing in **AWS**, **Azure**, **CI/CD**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**. Proficient in automating processes and building microservices and APIs using **Python** and **FastAPI**, ensuring seamless integration and deployment.
Demonstrated expertise in creating CI/CD pipelines for efficient software delivery and implementing **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** for reliable and scalable cloud environments. Knowledgeable in **Airflow** and **Argo** for orchestrating workflows, alongside a solid background in compliance-driven development aligning with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Additionally, adept in utilizing modern development practices with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue** for frontend solutions, coupled with backend capabilities in **Node.js**, **Django**, and **FastAPI**. Experienced in leveraging AI/ML for advanced predictive analytics and real-time processing.
